website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive gift basket that offers tasty snacks that are sweet and nutty, and in attractive packaging.
pros: A sturdy wood tray filled with a variety of dried fruits plus pistachios and almonds – healthy and delicious snacks
Consumers rave about the customer service the company provides
cons: Some purchasers wish that it were a bit larger – a common complaint of gift baskets – but overall quality and flavors earn praise

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassing as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a coworker, on behalf of my company. I asked her for her honest feedback, so I could know whether to send this to others. She felt awkward telling me that, while the pistachio's were good, the fruit was soggy and some of the nuts were stale. I felt very embarrassed to have given this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle A

customer_reviews.title: Not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: I started not to post this but-then I thought I wish someone had really let me know about this item so I could have had the knowledge that I needed to make an informed purchase. the small box that holds the fruit and nuts is only about 8 and 1/2 by 8 and 1/2 -that measurement includes the wood sides which is almost 3/8 inches thick. Had more almonds than anything else and the fruit tasted stale and gummy, not at all like dried fruit should taste. This was a Christmas gift for my husband and I thought with the money that it cost, since the quantity was not good at least it would taste good----nope. I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Nettles

customer_reviews.title: better off going to Walmart and getting a gift basket ...
customer_reviews.text: WAY too small, not worth the price, better off going to Walmart and getting a gift basket for less!
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: Check the size--this is small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a tiny thing--I thought it was huge! I bought it for a department of people but it wasn't big enough. Take note of the size! Too much money for size that came.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Krick

customer_reviews.title: dumb me, I should have read the other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: So... dumb me, I should have read the other reviews before purchasing. Not as pictured, small, stale, and frankly embarrassing as a gift. AMAZON! - drop this one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Paul

customer_reviews.title: Overall : Okay
customer_reviews.text: The apricots, peach and prunes were a bit hard, the dates and pear were leathery and the dates, apples and almonds were fine. All were good tasting though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Old, Dried Out Fruit!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought from this company before, and their products were good. This shipment for old. My husband and I could hardly chew the tough, dried out fruit. The dates and apricots were like leather. Plus they had lost their flavor. This must have been left from last year. I am glad that I did not send this product as a gift. I will not order from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tiganila

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous gift for the health conscious
customer_reviews.text: I buy this fruit tray every year as a Christmas gift to family members and friends. They enjoy the assortment and the fact that it is organic. It arrives well packaged, undamaged, and the fruits and nuts are fresh and delicious. A 'can't go wrong' gift option for many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to be able to order a pack of dried fruit and nuts and have it delivered to my friend. These were delicious and she completely enjoyed them. This was shipped on time and arrived on time for the event she was celebrating, so I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gee

customer_reviews.title: Product has stale smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: When we received the box, right after opening it, there was this stale smell came right to my nose, not surprisingly the fruits tasted dry and stale. Apparently the seller did not store them in a colder environment. After eating the dry fruits for about 3 days, I had some stomach problem then basically I stopped eating them and threw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The food was very good. Everyone liked it. It also came on a small serving tray that I used for water and medicine when I was sick in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dandybell

customer_reviews.title: Well Received Holiday Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a Christmas gift. Received high praise and many thanks from recipients within a few days of placing order. A healthy and delicious alternative for Christmas treat giving! Comments included “fresh, delicious, beautiful, quickly devoured”. Will definitely do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Aubry

customer_reviews.title: Making broke adult children look good
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t taste these so can’t comment on freshness or flavor. I gifted them to my parents and future in laws at our engagement party. It’s generally in good taste to gift something like along with other stuff so I’m really glad this was an option. Very happy with the gift ability aspect
customer_reviews.author: alwayssleepy86

customer_reviews.title: I never really bought dried fruit like this. They're all pretty tasty
customer_reviews.text: It comes in about a 8"x8" tray with 4 compartments. 1 tray (25%) is just pistachios. I think they're salted. Another tray (25%) is just almonds. So, 50% of the whole tray is just pistachios and almonds. The other 2 trays have an assortment of other items. They're all edible. Before getting this fruit tray, I never really bought dried fruit like this. They're all pretty tasty. I think it's definitely a good gift idea or a good "starter pack" to introduce you to dried fruits. For the price I think it's worth it. It might be a little more than 1 person can handle though if you snack on each item slowly.
customer_reviews.author: DentyneIce

customer_reviews.title: the product is not as pictured, few nuts and ...
customer_reviews.text: the product is not as pictured , few nuts and fruits , not even enough for one person .... They fooled me
customer_reviews.author: hilda

customer_reviews.title: It didn't  look fresh when I opened the packing. This was iffy at best.
customer_reviews.text: I choose this as a gift for a group of people...as a thank you gift. But I have to say. When I opened the package....the look left a lot to be desired. It looked old and not too fresh. But it was too late to return. I hate being unsure about a gift I'm giving. I asked the staff to call me. To tell me if it was fresh.It just didn't look fresh. Sorry😔
customer_reviews.author: sandra C

customer_reviews.title: it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: it was different than what showed in the picture, it was not at all same and it was not worth the money and didnot feel appropriate to give as a gift. it was a waste of money. will never recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fruit selection.  Kosher.
customer_reviews.text: Was --and is -- a lovely gift for holidays, bereavement, kosher, congratulations. Would like it to come in better quality tray, or on nice wood or bamboo cutting board. For same price!
customer_reviews.author: ginger w greenblatt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought it would be. but looks great-- they are for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I tried this dry fruit on sale and it was great. Too bad dry fruits cost so much I would have consistently buy these. Good for you and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kafui Adjabeng

customer_reviews.title: Never order gift sets.
customer_reviews.text: My son's family received this as a gift on 12/23. The nuts were absolutely fine. But all of the dried fruits were slimey and had that horrible spoiled smell. Completely inedible to eat. I am disabled in a wheel chair so it isn't easy for me to roll to the post office to return things. I don't believe I have had a delivery for food that was spoiled and as a gift yet. I was so embarrassed. I spend very much money on many items. No more food puchased for me unless I purchase items separately and assemble the gifts myself.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M Yerega

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.. only a few things good here.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the only things actually good within this box are the dates, apricot and pistachios. The rest are just bland. What in the world..? I don't know what those slices are; apple, pear? It's just bland and squishy.. blahh.. Prunes are bland and the almonds are not so good. Arrgh..
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for relatives and co workers
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this several times as gifts for various occasions and it's always well received.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Gaudi

customer_reviews.title: Small and Stale
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and my recipient said that it tasted very good but was hard and a but stale. It's pretty small as well
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Menn

customer_reviews.title: but this was a Sh*tty waste of money in his charming accent
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to a picky Frenchman for a Christmas treat. He said thank you, which meant the basket was fresh instead of saying thanks, but this was a Sh*tty waste of money in his charming accent. Easy $25 thoughtful gift when you don't want to send candy or cookies. I read some reviews of other baskets that did not look like the picture or reviewers said the food was old. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Good Taste, Happy Customer, Happy Gift Recipient
customer_reviews.text: Good Value, Good Taste, Happy Customer, Happy Gift Recipient...What more can be said...?
customer_reviews.author: Steady Breeze

customer_reviews.title: F
customer_reviews.text: Gift recipient was impressed with the choices and fresh quality of the dried fruit and assorted nuts. Apparently the attractive packaging was a plus for an elderly homebound relative who received a christmas delivery
customer_reviews.author: pkay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect house gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect house gift. Very well packaged. Was so happy with the first one we gave it as a gift. Ordered one just for us. It came over night! We weren't expecting it for three days! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent gift basket, not too fancy, but not bad for the price. The price on Amazon varies greatly from time to time, so keep that in mind. I have purchased 4 or 5 of these as gifts and some for myself to consume. The quality has been good and no issues with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: Dried fruit
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't happy with product. Was a gift for my son. The nuts were good but the dried fruit were too hard and chewy to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The people i gave these to for x-mas said they were not that great
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D

customer_reviews.title: You should seperate/fluff the fruit up if you plan on leaving out for company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just to have out on Christmas day as a snack tray for my little family of 3. I cover it every night we've finally finished it last night. It was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jennfier Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs a cheat sheet.
customer_reviews.text: A nice mix of fruits and nuts. Everything was fresh and tasty when it arrived and, being dried fruit, it keeps well. I docked a star because it was hard to tell what some of the fruit was without a 'cheat sheet' I know that's harder to do with fruit than chocolates, but as an example there were different types of Apricot in here and we had difficulty knowing which was which. Having said that every piece was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W Poch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’d sent this and other items from same company as gifts, and got such nice comments that I finally ordered one for my own household. We agree, very good! While in California you can buy local dried fruits directly for less, this is a great way to send a nicely packaged and reasonably priced edible gift that isn’t highly perishable across the country.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Y

customer_reviews.title: Freshest pistachios ever!
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. The pistachios are the freshest I have ever tasted. Big, too. Wish they sold just those. The almonds were fresh as well. And I like the selection of dried fruit, dried pears, especially. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P

customer_reviews.title: Nom nom nom
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this box is good. I would review each item, but they're all 5 stars individually. The fruit tray arrived on time and the packaging was charming. My girlfriend plans on using the box as a storage unit after we're completely finished eating its contents. It's really a lot of food, so it's taking quite some time!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Golden State Fruit & Nut Plate is an unbeatable Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this Golden State Fruit & Nut Plate to family members who buy what they want & need. Well,they appreciated & shared these wonderful healthy fruits & Nuts with those around them! I even bought one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl fitch

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a lot of this product as Diwali gift for my friends and family. The almonds were old and stale. In fact a lot of the fruits were stale. Very disappointed in the entire purchase. I have ordered over last few years, this year the product was ver bad
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: Mom really liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom. She really liked it. She thought it was fresh, delicious and a healthier option than chocolates and candy. I ordered another for my Dad. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fruit and nut basket
customer_reviews.text: These are simply awesome! I have bought these as gifts for my parents several times and my dad just raved about them. Good quality fruit (no sulfur) and the nuts are top notch as well. Good packaging, good price, great product what more do you want? They also have good customer service and it is here in the US. Highly recommended if you are looking for a food basket as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely presented pack of high quality dried fruits. Although dried, they are still moist and bursting with all of the individual flavors that each is supposed to have. We ordered this package to have snacks available over Christmas weekend. I would feel very comfortable ordering this again for the family or as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: dlcannon

customer_reviews.title: picture makes it look like you are getting a good quantity for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: picture makes it look like you are getting a good quantity for the price but in reality it is skimpy and not worth the cost....very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: My friends loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. My friends called me and told me how delicious all the fruit and nuts were. They also loved the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Lili1947

customer_reviews.title: for a quality gift.....good
customer_reviews.text: pistachio's were prime nuts. almonds good. dried fruit nice. for a gift worth it
customer_reviews.author: DEREK HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Good selection for families and friends
customer_reviews.text: All the families loved it needed send it to most of our friends
customer_reviews.author: Redhawk of Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Delectable
customer_reviews.text: Healthy nutrious way to start the new year delicious presentation awesome
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: sent as Christmas gift and friend said they loved it, great taste and looked so nice
customer_reviews.author: Steven T

customer_reviews.title: Past Best By Date
customer_reviews.text: This presents well visually, but the effect is spoiled when you see that it is past its Best By date which is right on the front. Item was sent for Mother's Day. Quite annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua S.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, loved it. Good quality dried fruit and food nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Shield

customer_reviews.title: It looked very festive
customer_reviews.text: I gave this for a Christmas present to a male friend of the family, he was quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ethelann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave one as a gift and liked it so much I bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: james mantell

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Nice assortment of "healthier" food options for our diabetic friends. The ability to deliver quickly also aided in this choice.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Surprised that there was such a small amount of product in the box. This was a gift so I can't comment on the quality of the fruit or nuts.
customer_reviews.author: biebo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I gave it as a gift. The recipient was impressed. The quality is terrific, the price appropriate and the combination of items is a good balance of fruits and nuts. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: friday
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Brother in law for Christmas. He really Loved this. He has congestive heart failure, & also loves nuts & fruit. Thank you for Having such a good variety of choices to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Friday

customer_reviews.title: They loved it and said it was the best food gift ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to inlaws. They loved it and said it was the best food gift they'd ever received. It also arrived early which is a bonus during the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Starbuck2277

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. It said it was a number 1 seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. It said it was a number 1 seller so I bought it as a gift. Looks more like a $15 gift than a $25 dollar gift. Not near as nice as the photo
customer_reviews.author: madame

customer_reviews.title: A most lovely and practical gift!
customer_reviews.text: The folks to whom this package was sent raved about it. The quality was great, they said, and they enjoyed it so very much. We had also been given this gift, so we know for ourselves how wonderful it was! In fact, it was the reason and the reassurance that sending it to someone (paying it forward!) would result in the same reaction that we had. What a great gift to send anyone of any age! Healthy, too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: I don't want this product and can't seem to cancel it. It is like a bad boomerang!! Please go away!!
customer_reviews.text: Cancel accidental subscribe and save is not working!!! It is not an item I would order again yet it seems I am stuck with it!!! Please cancel this order!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Matovich Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Sent to home for someone who had several family member ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent to home for someone who had several family member staying with her from out of town for funeral. Very much so appreciated by the family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely packaged and items were fresh
customer_reviews.text: I took it to a Rosh Hashanah dinner as a hostess gift. Was nice
customer_reviews.author: Michaelman2

customer_reviews.title: A healthy and tasty gift.
customer_reviews.text: This Golden State Fruit Pacific Coast Classic dried fruits is a great gift to give to a family as a Christmas gift. It was enjoyed so much last year that I gave it again as a gift to the family. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Out of six grown daughters, one totally delights in the dried fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Also, we love to give this dried fruit at Christmas to our friends and neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: a Keeper of Books!

customer_reviews.title: Sent as Gift - They Loved It
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift. The recipient loved it. She said the fruit and nuts were delicious and fresh. A bonus is the cute box it comes in -- she'll be reusing that for something crafty! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler742

customer_reviews.title: The dry fruit was a little dried out.
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to chew some of the fruit. The nuts were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Berger

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. :-| Dried fruits were okay. Nuts? Nothing special. Perhaps, I expected too much? I think it's just the whole preparation and packaging. It was a Valentine's Day gift. Now that I know that the dried fruits weren't such a hit, I think I'll just buy her a big bulk bag of nuts. Cost-wise? it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: jlson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sent to my Aunt and she loved ALL of it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Garland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. A bit small for the price. Seems pretty fresh. People in the office ate it up.
customer_reviews.author: PETER DUNWORTH

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and hope it tastes good!!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a gift so I can’t reccomend ir based on taste, however the box looks very nice and would be a nice gift. Fingers crossed the fruits and nuts are not stale.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Small surprise
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift to a supplier. I could tell from the picture that it is quite small, so I purchased 2 of these and another 2 of chocolate assortments and sent them all together. The supplier loved them, or at least they said they did. I don't know if it was to be kind. But I would recommend if you are buying this to send as a gift that you send at least 2. Just a suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Big Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and a hit at our family get together. Pistachios were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna V.

customer_reviews.title: The actual product is much smaller than the pictures. ...
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is much smaller than the pictures. Be ready to get a very tiny tray. If you are buying as a gift, I would reconsider! And be aware, they do NOT accept any return for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: nima

customer_reviews.title: Nice little snack box!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good dried fruit/nut basket. Only minor complaint would be I feel like it's slightly overpriced for amount of snacks in the box. Great for gifts though.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when it was supposed to and my 85 yr old father loves his birthday present...I'm so glad such gifts are available to send when you can't be there in person to wish them a happy anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: C. White

customer_reviews.title: The product inside is very fine and they were nicely received as gifts
customer_reviews.text: The plastic over the product tends to look smudged. The bow cam pressed flat on six different packages. These things sound petty and they only effect the cosmetic appeal of the gift. The product inside is very fine and they were nicely received as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C

customer_reviews.title: A little small for the price
customer_reviews.text: Although the contents are awesome, yes they are dried fruits but even those can be bad, it was a little smaller than I would have expected for the price. I am still happy with the purchase but wish that I could have gotten just a smidge more for my money...but hey, I bought it for Christmas so I guess its ok. :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Iniguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative
customer_reviews.text: A client bought this for our office as thanks and we were the ones who were grateful. We appreciate all the chocolate and cookies and other non-healthy items we are sent, but often it gets stale because it is so unhealthy and we don't like eating junk food. I took a cue from the client and gifted my mother with a basket for Mother's Day. Mom was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: Great for gifting. Love the selection and they are very good. I always buy these for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Alliyea Karim

customer_reviews.title: and great quality. I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Product was fresh, and great quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMALL.....for the price this is way too small. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Humbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to a family member overseas. Arrived quickly, fresh, and they complimented the taste and freshness. Felt this was a successful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice selection and very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice selection and very nice product. Slightly on the small side though so if you are planning on sending as a gift make sure it is to someone who does not eat much or who lives alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my children in Las Vegas for Christmas yummies. They loved it all. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Careful_193

customer_reviews.title: Sent this as a gift to my Grandfather and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent this as a gift to my Grandfather and he loves it. Says that the fruit and nuts are fresh and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I've given this as a gift to several people and they all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the pictured item with the pears and peach along with the dates and prunes. The other items are correct, but I received coconut-covered date candies instead of the pears and peaches. For the price, you should get what you order. Think I'll return it.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your hard earned cash
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Picture and description don't do a fair representation of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ilicha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift! I order this and others every year and will continue to order them!
customer_reviews.author: jray

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Tiny Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my Aunt who loves both dried fruit and nuts. I actually had to supplement this gift with something else because the tray size was so small. I was really disappointed. The quality was great, but the price for the size was not.
customer_reviews.author: QueenC815

customer_reviews.title: Another Good One
customer_reviews.text: We've sent this as a gift several times and all recipients have been happy. This last Mothers Day gift was no exception.
customer_reviews.author: vegas mike

customer_reviews.title: Really good fruit
customer_reviews.text: Really good food. I was nervous about the quality after shipping and who knows how long it was sitting on a shelf.... no worries there. All of the fruit was delicious and in good form. I would buy again as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Golden State Fruit is a great company to work with
customer_reviews.text: Golden State Fruit is a great company to work with, as is Amazon. I sent this to my Aunt and it was delivered to her apartment but she didn't get it in time. So Amazon replaced it for me. My Aunt loves it and really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie1111

customer_reviews.title: Good service, good fruits!
customer_reviews.text: The ordering process was so easy and the gift was delivered on time and before the specific holiday for which it was requested. We got good feedback on its contents and the recipient was happy that it was somewhat healthy (since so many gifts for the holidays are "not"). So, I will consider this gift again when looking for mail order gifts of this type!
customer_reviews.author: Alycone

customer_reviews.title: but I'm sure they tasted great. Nice gift for people you don't know what ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a last minute gift. It arrived in a timely matter and it looked delicious. Wish I could have tried the fruits and nuts myself, but I'm sure they tasted great. Nice gift for people you don't know what to get.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Pop

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Tasty nuts and fruits, however, some were not of our liking.
customer_reviews.author: Yusvani Meneses

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent this as a gift for the holidays and it was very well received. The people I gave it to are the kind who would have told me (tactfully) if there were a problem, so I am taking their very positive review to heart. Apparently, they liked the tray so much it was gone in a day while other food gifts remained uneaten. I would send this gift again.
customer_reviews.author: Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Great gift choice
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for others and was able to try some myself. It is packed in an attractive wooden tray with an inside dimension of 8 inches square. It was packed full with the fruit and nuts pictured. Nothing skimpy in filling it up. The fruit came wrapped so it stayed nice and moist and was not sticky or hard like some dried fruit can be. I liked the variety and selection. It made a great healthy snack alternative to most gift baskets. The free shipping the company offered clinched the deal and was another reason I selected this. Would gladly choose this again as a choice for me or others.
customer_reviews.author: bakerl

customer_reviews.title: Very small packet, completely misleading with the picture. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small packet, completely misleading with the picture. It was a shame for me after sending as a gift to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Palash Bharadwaj

customer_reviews.title: fresh and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: This is the second fruit tray I have purchased as a gift. The recipient really enjoyed it and commented on the product being very fresh and flavorful. This is the third fruit tray I have purchased as a gift. Once again this was a well received.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: My Grandparents loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my Grandparents, they loved it. : D I will continue to purchase this for them on special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Preschool teacher

product_meta.title: Pacific Coast Classic Dried Fruit Tray Gift with Almonds and Pistachios for Holiday Birthday Healthy Snack Business Gourmet Food Platter 26 ounces
product_meta.description: Send healthy smiles across the miles! Selections of California almonds and roasted, Salted California pistachios in the shell, as well as fruit dried and chosen especially for the most cheerful and cheering gifting experiences. Dried apricots, peaches, apples, plums, and prunes-thiss gift is nourishing in all the best and kindest ways. Kosher certified OU.
feature_bullets: ORCHARD DRIED PEARS: We're not just an Amazon seller, we are farmers! We depend upon sunshine and the fresh, beautiful earth, to grow the most delicious pears in California--each pear has its own journey from the branch to the farm to you. Dried after the harvest and preserved for a taste of sunshine all year long.

FRESH NUTS FROM THE SACRAMENTO AND SAN JOAQUIN VALLEYS: What is healthier, almonds or pistachios? Almonds have more calcium than any other nut. Plus, they are rich in fiber and vitamin E, an antioxidant that helps fight dangerous inflammation. Pistachios are lower in calories, contribute to healthy gut bacteria, also high in antioxidants, as well as B-6. We had a great idea! EAT BOTH! Your recipient will enjoy all the fabulous benefits of California almonds and pistachios!
KOSHER PAREVE OU CERTIFIED. Dimensions: 8 x 1.25 x 8 inches
GIFTED PRESENTATION: Fruit and nuts arranged and hand-packed in wooden serving tray, beribboned and attractively presented for a beautiful unboxing.
SENDING AS A GIFT? See alternate image for instruction on how to include a gift message. Be sure to sign your name and/or your company, so your recipient knows who to thank!
